import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sign-up', templateUrl: './sign-up.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sign-up.component.css'] }) export class SignUpComponent { username: string = ''; email: string = ''; password: string = ''; selectedRole: string = ''; numeroVet: string = ''; isValidForm(): boolean { return true; } } S'inscrire
